title: Skirt
description: very large, tightly pleated, black/blue skirt; bottom 15\" is three rows of 4 1/2\" square appliques in red, green, purple, white; bottom lined in blue cotton; two contrasting horizontal striped panels on bottom; two ties at band
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
